S06sspp2_4u:2: atha khalu śakro devāṇām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:3_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ceyaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇanto
S06sspp2_4u:3_1: dhārayanto vācayantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvanta iha dhārmikān guṇān
S06sspp2_4u:5_0: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnāḥ yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣanti tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
S06sspp2_4u:5_1: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tān yeṣāṃ kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyanti yac ca
S06sspp2_4u:5_2: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇvati sa tāvan na vipramuṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:9: janmasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti parivārasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06sspp2_4u:11_0: cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti svarasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti samādhisaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti
S06sspp2_4u:11_1: dhāraṇīsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti upāyakauśalyena cātmānaṃ buddhavigraham abhinirmāya
S06sspp2_4u:12: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anutpādaḥ prādurbhāvo nāsti,
S06sspp2_4u:13: te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06sspp2_4u:60: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. upāyakauśalyena ca sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti triṣu ca yāneṣu sattvān vinayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:62: atha śakro devānām indraḥ punar bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:63: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac cedaṃ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:112: evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:114: prajñāpāramitayā kauśika parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:165: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā yāṅ guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭidhārmikān parigṛhṇāti,
S06sspp2_4u:166: tāṃc chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:167: evaṃ bhagavann iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:169_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājako māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā adhimānikā
S06sspp2_4u:169_1: vā pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vigrahītukāmā bhaviṣyanti vivecayitukamā bhaviṣyanti
S06sspp2_4u:169_2: vivaditukāmā bhaviṣyanti virodhayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukamānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:170: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ te 'bhiprāyā na paripūrayiṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:171_0: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:171_1: caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā
S06sspp2_4u:172: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:173: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:174: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauḥśīlyam āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:175: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvāḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:176: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsā āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:179: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:180: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:181: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣepam āpadyate,
S06sspp2_4u:182: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:183: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:184: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvāḥ prajñānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:185: yeṣāṃ kṛte kauśika sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsāranti yad utānuśayaparyutthāne na tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakauśalena,
S06sspp2_4u:186_0: teṣāṃ sattvānām anuśayaparyutthānaṃ vigṛhyate sattvāś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāś
S06sspp2_4u:186_1: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu samādāpitāś catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpitā pañcasv abhijñāsu
S06sspp2_4u:186_2: samādāpitāḥ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu amādāpitāś caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu samādāpitāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:186_3: caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu samāpitāḥ pañcasv indriyeṣu samādāpitāḥ pañcasu baleṣu samādāpitāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:186_4: saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu samādāpitāḥ āryāṣṭāṅge mārge samādāpitāś caturṣv āryasatyeṣu samādāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:187: navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ sarvasamādhiṣu samādāpitāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu samādāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:188: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu samādāpitāḥ caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:198: ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā dṛṣṭadhārmikā na guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:199: saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvānyathāpratiṣṭhāne pratiṣṭhāpyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati.
S06sspp2_4u:200: ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāṃparāyikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:202: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati (ŚsP_II-4_6)
S06sspp2_4u:204_0: na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā anyatīrthikā vā parivrājakā
S06sspp2_4u:204_1: ādhimānika vā pudgalāḥ śakṣyanty asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vigrahāya vā vivādāya vā
S06sspp2_4u:204_2: virodhāya vāntardhānāya vā parākramitum uttare ca teṣāṃ guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:204_3: yadāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇagrahaṇabhāvanābhir anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāya
S06sspp2_4u:205_0: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika maghinām auṣadhīḥ sarvaviṣapraśamaṇī tatrāśīviṣeṇa vā jantunā
S06sspp2_4u:205_1: vā kṣudhābhibhūtenāhārānveṣiṇā kiṃcid eva prāṇijātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavet. sa tat prāṇakajātaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:205_2: khāditukāmatayānugacchet. atha tat prāṇakajātaṃ maraṇabhayabhītaṃ yena sā maghī nām'
S06sspp2_4u:205_3: auṣadhis tenopasaṃkrāman tataḥ sa āśīviṣas tasyā auṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvartitavyaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:206: tathā hi tasyā auṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇo yaṃ tasyāśīviṣasya tad viṣam abhibhavaty eva balavatī hi kauśika sā maghī auṣadhiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:207: evam eva kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:208: tatra kauśika ya utpannotpannā vigrahavivādavirodhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:209: te prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā prajñāpāramitāyā balena kṣipram evāntardhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:213: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarveṣāṃ pāpakānāṃ dharmāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā yad uta rāgadveṣamohāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā.
S06sspp2_4u:227: yāvat kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasyopaśamayitri na vivardhikā,
S06sspp2_4u:320: eteṣāṃ kauśika sarvesāṃ mārakāyikānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitopaśamayitrī na vivardhikā,
S06sspp2_4u:321_0: yāvanta kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca devānām
S06sspp2_4u:321_1: indro brahmānaś ca sahāpatiḥ ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāso devāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:322: te sarve tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:323: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:325: sa punar akuśalebhayaś ca dharmebhyaḥ parihāsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:328: yad uta dānapāramitayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyate 'nupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:380: sa ādeyavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati mitavacanas ca bhaviṣyati na ca vikīrṇavacano bhaviṣyati na krodhābhibhūto bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:390: parāṃś cādattādānavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati. adattādānavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:393: ātmanā ca kāmamithyācārāt prativirato bhaviṣyati. parāṃś ca kāmamithyācāravairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati kāmamithyācāraviramaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:396: ātmanā ca mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhaviṣyati. parāṃś ca mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:401: paiśunyavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyati, ye cānye (ŚsP_II-4_11)
S06sspp2_4u:463: ye cānye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:467: ye cānye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:471: ye cānye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:475: ye cānye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:479: ye cānye mahāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:483: ye cānye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:487: ye cānye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:491: ye cānye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:495: ye cānye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:499: ye cānye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:503: ye cānye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:507: ye cānye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:511: ye cānye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:515: ye cānye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:519: ye cānye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:523: ye cānye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:527: ye cānye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:531: ye cānye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:533: ātmanā ca sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyate parāṃś ca sarvasamādhisamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:535: ye cānye sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:539: ye cānye dhāraṇīpratilambhā bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:544: ye cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:548: ye cānye dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:552: ye cānye tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:556: ye cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:560: ye cānye mahāmaitrī samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:564: ye cānye karuṇā samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:568: ye cānye muditāṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:572: ye cānye upekṣāṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:576: ye cānye ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:580: ye cānye vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:584: ye cānye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati (ŚsP_II-4_15)
S06sspp2_4u:589: ye cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:593: ye cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:597: ye cānye samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:601: ye cānye ṛddhipādān bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:605: ye cānye pañcendriyāṇi bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:677: ātmanā ca mārgākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyati, parāṃś ca
S06sspp2_4u:689: sa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dāsyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:690: yac chīlaṃ rakṣiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:691: yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:692: yad vīryaṃ ārapsyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:693: yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:694: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:695: evaṃ carataḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir utpatsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:696: saced dānaṃ na dāsyāmi durgateṣu kuleṣūpapatsya na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:697: sacet chīlaṃ na rakṣiṣyāmi tisṛṣu me durgatīṣūpapattir bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:699: na sattvaparipāko na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:701: indriyāṇi me paribhetsyate mukhamaṇḍalaṃ me dhyāmībhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:703_0: yayā rūpasaṃpadayā bodhisattvacārikāḥ carataḥ sattvasahadarśane naiva niyatā bhaviṣyanty
S06sspp2_4u:703_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na ca rūpasaṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na buddhakṣetraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:704: sacet kusīdo bhaviṣyati nemaṃ śakṣyāmi bodhimārgam anuprāptaṃ na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:705: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñataṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:706_0: saced vikṣiptacitto bhaviṣyāmi nedaṃ śaksyāmi samādhim utpādayituṃ yena samādhinā
S06sspp2_4u:706_1: sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na me buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na sarvākārajñatām
S06sspp2_4u:707: duṣprajño bhaviṣyāmi na śakṣyāmi prajñopāyakauśalena śrāvakabhūmipratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:709_0: ayuktam etad bhaved yo māṃ mātsaryavaśena dānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena
S06sspp2_4u:709_1: śīlapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vyāpadavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ kauśīdyavaśena
S06sspp2_4u:709_2: vīryapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena
S06sspp2_4u:710: aparipūrayan dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:711: evaṃ khalu kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikāṃś ca sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilapsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:712: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:715: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06sspp2_4u:717: yathā punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnamārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06sspp2_4u:718: śakra āha: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaś ca dānaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_4u:719_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:719_1: śrāvakebhyaś ca sa kṛpaṇavanīyakārthena yācanakebhyaś ca sa tena dānenānupāyakauśalenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:721: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:723: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:725: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:726: laukikyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ. evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:728: carataḥ, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:731: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:733: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:735: evaṃ bhavaty aham ṛddhipādān bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:737: evaṃ bhavaty aham indriyāṇi bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:739: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ balāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:741: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:743: evaṃ bhavaty aham āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:745: evaṃ bhavaty aham āryasatyāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:747: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:749: evaṃ bhavaty aham apramāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:751: evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattir bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:753: evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:755: evaṃ bhavaty aham anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:757: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:759: evaṃ bhavaty aham abhijñāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:761: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samādhīn bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
S06sspp2_4u:762: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvadhāraṇīḥ pratilapsye sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:763: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:765: bhavaty ahaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:766: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidā bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:767: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:768: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:769: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:770: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:771: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
S06sspp2_4u:772_0: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikeṣu dharmeṣu caran unnāmaṃ gacchaty
S06sspp2_4u:772_1: ahaṃkārābhiniveśena tasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāya nānunnāmārthāya pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:774_0: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottarāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvān
S06sspp2_4u:774_1: na dāyakam upalabhate na dānam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate. evaṃ khalu
S06sspp2_4u:774_2: bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya
S06sspp2_4u:775_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāc chīlaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:775_1: śīlaṃ nopalabhyate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:775_2: carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:776_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:776_1: kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:776_2: carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:777_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvād vīryaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:777_1: vīryavaṃ taṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:778: sa lokottarāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitā subhāvitatvād dhyānaṃ nopalabhate dhyānaṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan (ŚsP_II-4_21)
S06sspp2_4u:779: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:780_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt prajñāṃ nopalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:780_1: prajñāṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:780_2: carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:781: sa smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:782: sa samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:783: sa ṛddhipādān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:784: sa indriyāṇi bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:785: sa balāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:786: sa bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:787: sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:788_0: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya
S06sspp2_4u:788_1: ca pratyupasthitā bhavati. sa āryasatyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:789: sa dhyānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:791: sa ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:792: sa vimokṣā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsu bhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:794: sa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:796: sa samādhīn bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:797_0: sa dhāraṇīmukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. evaṃ khalu
S06sspp2_4u:798: sa tathāgatabalāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:799: sa vaiśāradyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:800: sa pratisaṃvido bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:801: sa mahāmaitrīṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:802: sa mahākaruṇā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:803: sa āveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. (ŚsP_II-4_22)
S06sspp2_4u:804: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyā prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:805: sa sarvajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:806: sa mārgākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:807_0: sa sarvākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. evaṃ khalu
S06sspp2_4u:811: atha khalu bhagavāñ chakro devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:812: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati svādhyāpayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:815: tatra sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyann avataret,
S06sspp2_4u:816: tatrāvatīrya tiṣṭheta nāsau kulaputro vā kuladuhitā yā parājayaṃ yāsyati,
S06sspp2_4u:817: jaya evāsya bhaviṣyaty akṣataś cānupahataś ca taṃ saṃgrāmam uttariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:818: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra saṃgrāme samabhirūḍho jīvitāntarāyaṃ nigacchen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06sspp2_4u:819: sacet punar asya kaścid eva śastraṃ vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śarīre kṣipet na tasya śarīre patiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:820: tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dīrgharātraṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā,
S06sspp2_4u:821: ātmanaś ca rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāni nirjitāni pareṣāṃ rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:822: ātmanaś ca dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:823: ātmanaś ca mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:824: ātmanaś ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:825: ātmanaś ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:826: ātmanaś cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:827: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatāṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:828: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya śastrāṇi vā kāṇḍāni vā kṣiptāni śarīre na nipatiṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:829: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:830: sarvajñatācittena cāvirahito bhaviṣyati. tasya kaścid abhaiṣajyam avakiret kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadā copanāmayet,
S06sspp2_4u:831: śastreṇa vā dadyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake cainaṃ chorayet sarvaṃ tat tasya na kramiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:832: mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā, (ŚsP_II-4_24)
S06sspp2_4u:833: niruttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:834: atra ca vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇeḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:835_0: tathā hi so 'tra śikṣamāṇo nātmānam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:835_1: na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:835_2: na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakaṃ upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:835_3: na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:943: anupalambhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06sspp2_4u:945: sarvasattvānāṃ cittāni vyavalokayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:946: atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06sspp2_4u:947: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:948: ye 'pi te etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:949: te 'py atraiva vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:952: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyate udgṛhīṣyati na svādhyāpayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyate na yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:953: na punar tatra gṛhe vā grāme vā nagare vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣāvatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:954_0: tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārthāya ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06sspp2_4u:954_1: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrā yāmā devaputrāḥ tuṣitā devaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:954_2: nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavasavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā devaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:954_3: brahmapurohitā devaputrā brahmapārṣadyā devaputrā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
S06sspp2_4u:954_4: devāḥ apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
S06sspp2_4u:954_5: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā
S06sspp2_4u:954_6: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā ye 'py aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu
S06sspp2_4u:954_7: lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrāḥ yāmā devaputrās
S06sspp2_4u:954_8: tuṣitā devaputrā nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā
S06sspp2_4u:954_9: devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
S06sspp2_4u:954_10: devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
S06sspp2_4u:954_11: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā
S06sspp2_4u:954_12: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:956: te ca devaputrā āgatyaināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā gamiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:957_0: yaḥ kaścit kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati tasyeme dṛṣṭadhārmikā
S06sspp2_4u:957_1: guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. tad yathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍe gatā bodhimaṇḍasya
S06sspp2_4u:957_2: ca parisāmantagate na bodhimaṇḍasya cābhyantare tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinā manuṣyabhūtā
S06sspp2_4u:957_3: vā na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:958_0: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
S06sspp2_4u:958_1: abhisaṃbuddhā. ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06sspp2_4u:960_0: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti te 'py atraiva niṣadyānuttarāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:960_1: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. taiḥ sarvatathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair
S06sspp2_4u:960_3: pratipadyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā devamānuṣīṣu saṃpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyante pratiṣṭhāpyante ca,
S06sspp2_4u:965: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyante pratiṣṭhāpyante ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:966_0: anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sa pṛthivīpradeśe sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūtaḥ kṛto
S06sspp2_4u:966_1: vandanīyo namaskaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyaḥ puṣpair dhūpair
S06sspp2_4u:966_2: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:968: śakra āha: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06sspp2_4u:969_0: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhāraya tāṃ ca puṣpair dhūpair mālyair
S06sspp2_4u:969_1: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
S06sspp2_4u:970_0: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamayastūpe tathāgataśarīrāni
S06sspp2_4u:970_1: pratiṣṭhāpayet parihared vā saptaratnamaye samudgate kṛtvā tāni ca satkuryād gurukurād
S06sspp2_4u:970_2: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:973: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pariprakṣyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:974: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:975_0: kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā yaś cāyam
S06sspp2_4u:975_1: ātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ. katamasyāṃ pratipati śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
S06sspp2_4u:976: śakra āha: ihaiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:982: tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāgacchati. sarvākārajñatāpratilambhena tu tathāgatas tathāgata iti. saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:983: yeyaṃ kauśika sarvākārajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā niryātā,
S06sspp2_4u:984_0: evam ayaṃ kauśikātmabhāvas tasya sarvākarajñatājñānasyāśrayabhūta imaṃ cāśrayaṃ niśritya
S06sspp2_4u:984_1: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā evaṃ tasya sarvākārajñatājñānasyāyam
S06sspp2_4u:984_2: ātmabhāva āśrayabhūtasarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyo mānanīyo pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo
S06sspp2_4u:984_3: gurukaraṇīyaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ parinivṛtasyāpi ca kauśika śarīrāny evaṃ śarīrapūjā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:985_0: na tv anyathadharmapūjāḥ yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:985_1: likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:986_0: puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:986_1: sarvākārajñatājñānasya tena pūjākṛto bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tarhi kauśika śrāddhena kulaputreṇa
S06sspp2_4u:986_2: vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgataṃ pūjayitukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā likhitvodgrahītavyā
S06sspp2_4u:986_3: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:987_0: satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair
S06sspp2_4u:987_1: vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ yaś ca kauśika tathāgatasya
S06sspp2_4u:988_0: saptaratnamaye vā samugate kṛtvā pariharet tataś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:988_1: pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:988_2: patākābhiḥ yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyād
S06sspp2_4u:988_3: yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tāṃ ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair
S06sspp2_4u:988_4: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ. ayam
S06sspp2_4u:988_5: eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1075: ato niryātās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_4u:1077_0: śakra āha: ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na satkurvanti
S06sspp2_4u:1077_1: na gurukurvanti na mānayanti na pūjayanti tat kiṃ te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā na jānanty
S06sspp2_4u:1079: kauśikāyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye dharma abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:1080: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣā saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1081: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1082: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā,
S06sspp2_4u:1084: ye dharme abhedyaprasādena samanvāgato ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:1085: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅksāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1086: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatā saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatā.
S06sspp2_4u:1089: kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1090: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1091: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1092: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1093: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1094: kiyantas te jambūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1095: kiyantas te jāmbūdvipakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1096: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1097: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1098: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1099: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1100: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1101: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinas (ŚsP_II-4_31)
S06sspp2_4u:1102: tato 'lpakā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye na vānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1105_0: tato 'lpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannās
S06sspp2_4u:1105_1: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām
S06sspp2_4u:1105_2: acalabhāgīyānā saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1105_3: prahāṇād arhatas tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1106: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1108: evam etat kauśikaivam etad 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:1111: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1112: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1113: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1114_0: tato 'lpatarakā ye srotaāpannās tato 'lpatarakā ye sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā
S06sspp2_4u:1114_1: ye anāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye 'rhantaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitās
S06sspp2_4u:1114_2: tato 'lpatarakā ye 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye
S06sspp2_4u:1115_0: tathā hi pūrvantaiḥ saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ na buddhādṛṣṭo na dharmaśrana saṃghaḥ paryupāsito
S06sspp2_4u:1115_1: na dānaṃ dattaṃ na śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ na kṣāntiṃ bhāvitā na vīryam ālabdhaṃ na dhyānāni
S06sspp2_4u:1166: tad anena te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1167: alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā sattvā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dharme abhedyprasādena samanvāgatā saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1173: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1174: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadvesamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1175: tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1176: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1178: tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye athyāsayena caranti niṣṭhatu kauśika manuṣyāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1179: kauśika kiyanto jāmbūdvīpe prāṇināye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye navānām (ŚsP_II-4_33)
S06sspp2_4u:1180: anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr lābhino ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1181: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāmino ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1183_0: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ kiyants te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1183_1: samyaksaṃbodhau niṣkāṅkṣā buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1183_2: prāṇino ye mātṛjñāḥ ye pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ kule jyeṣṭopacāyakā dānāni dadati śīlaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1186: anātmasaṃjñino 'śucisaṃjñinaḥ sarvalokeṣv anabhirati saṃjñanaḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1188: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1196: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1197: ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1198: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitā alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1202: alpakās te kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1205: ye navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1208: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmino ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1213: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1214: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1217: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhatuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1218: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhante yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1221: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1222: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1225: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1226: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1229: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadlvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1230_0: prajñāparamitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe
S06sspp2_4u:1230_1: te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya
S06sspp2_4u:1233: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1234: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1237: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1238: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1241: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1242: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1245: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1246: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1249: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye caranti,
S06sspp2_4u:1250: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhate yad bhūyastvena (ŚsP_II-4_36)
S06sspp2_4u:1251: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1254_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika ye te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06sspp2_4u:1254_1: saṃprasthitās taiḥ kṣipraṃ sukhaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukamair iyaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1255: yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya yoniśaś ca manasikṛtvā,
S06sspp2_4u:1257: tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:1259_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi
S06sspp2_4u:1259_1: pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ catvāry āryasatyāni catvāri dhyānāni
S06sspp2_4u:1259_2: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1259_3: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni pañcābhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni
S06sspp2_4u:1259_4: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ mahāmaitri mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1260: anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā yatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā te py udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1261: tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ jñāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1262: atra hi tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ śikṣito yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:1265_0: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañceṣv indriyeṣu
S06sspp2_4u:1265_1: pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge mārge caturṣv āryasatyeṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu
S06sspp2_4u:1265_2: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
S06sspp2_4u:1265_3: triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu
S06sspp2_4u:1265_4: tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1267: asmābhir apy anuśikṣitavyam eṣāsmākaṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:1268_0: yāvad anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā etad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ pratyekabuddhānām
S06sspp2_4u:1268_1: arhatām anāgāmināṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ srotaāpannānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1268_2: śikṣamāṇā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1314: buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhā arhanto 'nāgāminaḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ srotaāpannāḥ pāraṅgatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti ca.
S06sspp2_4u:1316: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tiṣṭhati tathāgataparinirvṛte vā tathāgate,
S06sspp2_4u:1317: prajñāpāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1318: eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1319: dhyānapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1320: eṣaiva kauśika dhyānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1321: vīryapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1322: eṣaiva kauśika vīryapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1323: kṣāntipāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1324: eṣaiva kauśika kṣāntipāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurayāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1325: śīlapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1326: eṣaiva kauśika śīlapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1327: dānapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1328: eṣaiva kauśika dānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratisaraṇam.
S06sspp2_4u:1329: adhyātmaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1330: eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1331: bahirdhāśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1332_0: eṣaiva kauśika bahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1332_1: pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyataiva
S06sspp2_4u:1333: eṣaiva kauśikādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1336: eṣaiva kauśika śūnyatāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1337: mahāśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1338: eṣaiva kauśika mahāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1339: paramārthaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1340: eṣaiva kauśika paramārthaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1341: saṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1342: eṣaiva kauśika saṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1343: asaṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1344: eṣaiva kauśikāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1345: atyantaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1346: eṣaiva kauśika atyantaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1347: anavarāgraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1348: eṣaiva kauśika anavarāgraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1349: anavakāraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1350: eṣaiva kauśika anavakāraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1351: prakṛtiśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1352: eṣaiva kauśika prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1353: sarvadharmaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1354: eṣaiva kauśika sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1355: svalakṣaṇaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1356: eṣaiva kauśika svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1359: eṣaiva kauśikānupalambhaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1360: abhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1361: eṣaiva kauśikābhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇam,
S06sspp2_4u:1362: svabhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:1405: etāny eva kauśika vaiśāradyāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,

S06sspp2_4u:1407: etā eva kauśika pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,

S06sspp2_4u:1410: āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1411: eta eva kauśika āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1412: sarvajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1413: etā eva kauśika sarvajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1414: mārgākārajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1415: etā eva kauśika mārgākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1416: sarvākārajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1417: etā eva kauśika sarvākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratisaraṇam.
S06sspp2_4u:1419_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1419_1: stūpaṃ kārayed yojanamuccaitvenārdhayojanaṃ vistareṇāyāṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ divyaiś puṣpair
S06sspp2_4u:1419_2: divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair
S06sspp2_4u:1419_3: divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyair vādyaiḥ satkuryā
S06sspp2_4u:1419_4: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1420: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1421: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1423: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ (ŚsP_II-4_43)
S06sspp2_4u:1424: puṇyaṃ prasavati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1425_0: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyaty uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:1425_1: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:1426: tiṣṭhantu kauśikaikaḥ stūpaḥ sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataparinirvṛte,
S06sspp2_4u:1427_0: imaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūraye yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistātais
S06sspp2_4u:1427_1: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1427_2: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1427_3: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1428: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1429: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1431: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06sspp2_4u:1432: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1434: uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1436_0: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ cāturmahādvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate
S06sspp2_4u:1436_1: parinirvṛte pūjayaiḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
S06sspp2_4u:1436_2: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1436_3: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1436_4: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1437: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1438: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1440: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1441: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1442: likhitvā nu satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair (ŚsP_II-4_44)
S06sspp2_4u:1443: gandhair vilepanaiś curṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1444_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturmahādvīpako lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:1444_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ cūḍikaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte
S06sspp2_4u:1444_2: pūjāyai saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
S06sspp2_4u:1444_3: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1444_4: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1444_5: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1445: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1446: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1448: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1449: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1451: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1452_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasracūḍiko lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:1452_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ madhyamaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte
S06sspp2_4u:1452_2: pūjāyai saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
S06sspp2_4u:1452_3: tāṃś ca yāvat kṣīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1452_4: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1452_5: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1453: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1454: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1456: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1457: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1459: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1460: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte (ŚsP_II-4_45)
S06sspp2_4u:1461_0: pūjāyai imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyair saptaratnamayais
S06sspp2_4u:1461_1: tathāgatacaityaiḥ paripūjayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca satkuryād
S06sspp2_4u:1461_2: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1461_3: vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1461_4: patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1462: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1464: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1466: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1467: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1469: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1470_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇo ye kecit
S06sspp2_4u:1470_1: kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte
S06sspp2_4u:1470_2: pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayet tāṃ ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:1470_3: pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś
S06sspp2_4u:1470_4: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1471: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1473: tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1474: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1475_0: śakra āha: evam etad bhagavan evam etat sugata prajñāpāramitā bhagavan satkurvadbhiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1475_1: gurukurvadbhir mānayadbhiḥ pūjayadbhir atītānagatapratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1475_2: samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānito pūjito bhavanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1476_0: yāvantaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
S06sspp2_4u:1476_1: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
S06sspp2_4u:1476_2: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
S06sspp2_4u:1477: divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1478_0: yāvanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
S06sspp2_4u:1478_1: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
S06sspp2_4u:1478_2: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
S06sspp2_4u:1478_3: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
S06sspp2_4u:1478_4: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1479_0: yāvantaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas

S06sspp2_4u:1479_2: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed

S06sspp2_4u:1480_0: yāvanta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas

S06sspp2_4u:1480_3: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
S06sspp2_4u:1480_4: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1481_0: yāvanta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1481_1: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccaistve
S06sspp2_4u:1481_2: nārdhayojanaṃ vistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet

S06sspp2_4u:1481_4: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1482_0: yāvantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1482_1: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve
S06sspp2_4u:1482_2: na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet

S06sspp2_4u:1482_4: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1484_0: yāvanto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1484_1: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve
S06sspp2_4u:1484_2: na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet

S06sspp2_4u:1484_4: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1485_0: yāvantaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1485_1: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve
S06sspp2_4u:1485_2: na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:1485_3: pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś
S06sspp2_4u:1485_4: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1486_0: yāvanto 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
S06sspp2_4u:1486_1: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
S06sspp2_4u:1486_2: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
S06sspp2_4u:1486_3: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
S06sspp2_4u:1486_4: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1487_0: yāvanta upariṣṭhād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
S06sspp2_4u:1487_1: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
S06sspp2_4u:1487_2: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
S06sspp2_4u:1487_3: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
S06sspp2_4u:1487_4: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś
S06sspp2_4u:1488: bhagavan api nu sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1491: śakra āha: ataḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06sspp2_4u:1492: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1494: tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1495: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat (ŚsP_II-4_48)
S06sspp2_4u:1497: atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām antargatāḥ sarve kuśalā dharmās tad yathā daśa kuśalaḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1498: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:1500: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1501_0: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitā catvāry āryasatyāni duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1501_1: duḥkhanirodhā mārgaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā aṣṭā vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1501_2: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06sspp2_4u:1501_3: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvākārajñatā
S06sspp2_4u:1501_4: idaṃ tad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ yatra sarvaśrāvkapratyekabuddhānām atitānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1501_5: buddhā bhagavantaḥ śikṣitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṅgatā gacchati gamiṣyati ca.
S06sspp2_4u:1505: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānāṃ indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:1507_0: bahu te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyaty aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam acintyam
S06sspp2_4u:1507_1: atulyam aparimāṇaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1507_2: likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06sspp2_4u:1508: uttare ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1509: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1510_0: prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā
S06sspp2_4u:1561_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputrā vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1561_1: likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:1562_0: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
S06sspp2_4u:1562_1: vividhaiś ca vādyair asya kauśika puṇyābhisaṃskārasyāsau pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1562_2: śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm
S06sspp2_4u:1562_3: api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyam api kalām api gaṇanām
S06sspp2_4u:1562_4: apy upamām apy upaniśam api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1563_0: yāvat kileyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāṃbūdvīpe sthāsyati. tāvan na buddharatnasyāntardhānaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1563_1: bhaviṣyati na dharmaratnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃgharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1564: tāvad daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1653: pratyekabuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ samudāgaḥ prajñāsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:1659_0: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā
S06sspp2_4u:1659_1: yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavasavartinā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā
S06sspp2_4u:1659_2: mahābrahmaṇo ābhāḥ parīttabhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1659_3: śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā
S06sspp2_4u:1659_4: akaniṣṭhā devās taṃ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate :
S06sspp2_4u:1660: udgṛhītavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā vācayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā paryavāptavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:1662: etayā mārṣa prajñāpāramitayodgṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā (ŚsP_II-4_53)
S06sspp2_4u:1663: vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā avyavacchedo bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1665: saṃghanetryā avyavacchedo bhaviṣyati buddhanetryā mārṣa avyavacchedo 'nudharmanetryā avyavacchedo 'nusaṃghanetryā avyavacchedaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1722: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
S06sspp2_4u:1723: udgṛhāṇa tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśaś ca manasikuruṣvemāṃ prajñāpāramitām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1725_0: devāṃs trāyastriṃśān yodhayiṣyāmo devais trāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāmas
S06sspp2_4u:1725_1: tadā tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhṛtya manasā svadhyāya kuryāḥ yoniśaś
S06sspp2_4u:1725_2: ca manasikuryā evaṃ teṣām asurāṇāṃ te samudācārāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1726: punar evāntarddhāsyati na punas te cittotpādā vivardhiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1727_0: yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ cyutikālaḥ syāṃ te cātmanaḥ pāpopapattiṃ paśyeyus
S06sspp2_4u:1727_1: teṣāṃ tvaṃ kauśika purataḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās te tena prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:1727_2: śravaṇakuśalamūlena prajñāpāranutā prasādena ca tatraiva devabhavaneṣūpapatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1728_0: evaṃ mahārthikā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā śravaṇaṃ yasya kasyacit kulaputrasya vā
S06sspp2_4u:1728_1: kuladuhitur vā devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotāvabhāsaṃ gamiṣyanti
S06sspp2_4u:1728_2: sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1729: tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvan atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīhaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:1730: ye 'pi ta etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1731: sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1732: tathā hi kauśikātra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve bodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā.
S06sspp2_4u:1733: śakra āha: mahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā asamasameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1737: evam etat kauśikaivam etat mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:1738: asamasameyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1739_0: tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06sspp2_4u:1739_1: ta etāṃ vidyām āgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty
S06sspp2_4u:1739_2: anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py etām eva vidyām āgamyānuttarāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1740: ye 'pi ta etarhi daśa dig lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1741: te 'py etām eva vidyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1742: tathā hi kauśikemāṃ vidyām āgamya daśakuśalā karmapathāḥ loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:1793: āveṇikabuddhadharmā loke prajñāyante. dharmadhātur loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:1810: bodhisattvam api kauśikāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prabhāṣyante. catvāri dhyānāni prabhāvyante,
S06sspp2_4u:1869_0: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvoṣadhitārānakṣatrāṇi prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:1870: yadāpi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke notpādo bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:1871: tadāpi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvebhyo laukikalokottarān dharmān deśayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1873: tac ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ prajñāpāramitāniryātaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1874: yenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1918: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati. na ca śrāvakabhūmau patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmisākṣāt karoti,
S06sspp2_4u:1919: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06sspp2_4u:1920: āyuḥsaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti sattvasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti buddhakṣetrasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti,
S06sspp2_4u:1923: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1924: sa ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:1925: śakra āha: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1926: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:1928: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1935: ye ca puna rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1936: sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1941: yathāpi tad asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejonubhāvena sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1942: tam enaṃ te rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā priyavacanair ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:1945: tathā hi kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1946: ebhiḥ kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā (ŚsP_II-4_59)
S06sspp2_4u:1947: kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:1948: katamaiś ca kauśika sāṃparāyikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:1949: yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ karmapathair avirahitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1950: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1951_0: na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir na smṛtyupasthānair na samyakprahāṇair na ṛddhipādair nendriyair
S06sspp2_4u:1951_1: na balair na bodhyaṅgair na mārgeṇa nāryasatyair na dhyānair nāpramāṇair nārūpyasamāpattibhir
S06sspp2_4u:1951_3: nābhijñābhir na samādhibhir na dhāraṇīmukhair na tathāgatabalair na vaiśāradyair
S06sspp2_4u:1957: veṇukarakule vā puṣkasakule vā mauṣṭhikacaṇḍālaurānikasaukārikakuleṣu vā śūdrakuleṣu vā satatasamitaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1958: yatra ca lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti tatra lokadhātuṣūpapatsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:1959: na jātu bodhisattvābhijñābhir virahito bhaviṣyati. sa ākāṅkṣaṃ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1960: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya sa buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1962: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā imāṃ guṇasaṃpadām ākāṅkṣadbhir iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:1964: ta ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikaiḥ sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1969: athānyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmaṃ nyāsīt.
S06sspp2_4u:1970: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūd,
S06sspp2_4u:1971: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma,
S06sspp2_4u:1972: ya nv ahaṃ yāvan mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt,
S06sspp2_4u:1973: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā udgṛhītaṃ tat svādhyāyaṃ kuryāṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1974: yadi me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakām upasaṃkramya bhagavato 'ntarāyaṃ ca kuryuḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:1975: atha śakro devānām indro yāvad bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyām udgṛhītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma.
S06sspp2_4u:1976: atha te 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavataṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
S06sspp2_4u:1977: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1979: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yena me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1980: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataś chāradvatīputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1981_0: parivitarkam ājāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayataḥ śakreṇa sāradvatīputra devānām
S06sspp2_4u:1982: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1983: na hi śāradvatīputra eṣām anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklāṅgaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:1984: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā imāṃ parṣadam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃyante nāhaṃ taṃ śāradvatīputra samanupaśyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:1985_0: sadevaloke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1985_1: pratihatacitto vā upārambhābhiprāyo vā upasaṃkramen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1986_0: tathā hi śāradvatīputra ya iha trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06sspp2_4u:1986_1: devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:1986_2: brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmaṇa ābhaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā
S06sspp2_4u:1986_3: ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubbā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā
S06sspp2_4u:1986_4: bṛhatphalā anabhrakā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1987: ye ca śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi (ŚsP_II-4_61)
S06sspp2_4u:1988: bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1989: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitā niryātāḥ sarvam.
S06sspp2_4u:1990_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06sspp2_4u:1990_1: buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās
S06sspp2_4u:1990_2: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1991: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:1992_0: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1992_2: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:1994_2: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
