S06sspp2_4u:3513: tayā ca dharmatāpāramitayā paribhāvitāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena parinirvṛtasyāpi tasya tathāgatasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06sspp2_4u:3515: punar aparaṃ bhagavan tiṣṭhantu trisāhasramahāsāḥsro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3516: sacet bhagavan daśasu dikṣuḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhā bhaveyur yac ca prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyetaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3517: anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhīyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3518: ato niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjyaṃte prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitani bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06sspp2_4u:3519_0: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād
S06sspp2_4u:3519_1: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya
S06sspp2_4u:3519_3: deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu yāmeṣu deveṣu tuṣiteṣu deveṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
S06sspp2_4u:3519_4: deveṣu sukham anubhūya tenaiva kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3520: etāvat tathāgataśarīrapūjāyāḥ phalam imāṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan samādhipāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3565: śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3570_0: yadi vā cakravartāśrayaṃ yadi vā kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu
S06sspp2_4u:3570_1: yadi vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā śakrarūpeṇa yadi vā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yadi vā
S06sspp2_4u:3570_2: vaiśramaṇarūpeṇa sa tair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3571: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan na mama tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpy apratyayā nāpy apūjayitukāmatā nāpy agrahītukāmatā.
S06sspp2_4u:3572_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvatā
S06sspp2_4u:3572_1: gurukurvatā mānayatā pūjayata sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ hetur upacito bhavati sarvasaṃpattayaś
S06sspp2_4u:3573: tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkṛtā bhavanti gurukṛtāni bhavanti yāni tāni bhavanti pūjitāni bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:3574: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā (ŚsP_II-4_115)
S06sspp2_4u:3575_0: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyate yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti tān
S06sspp2_4u:3575_1: dhharmakāyena ca jñānakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena pūjayitukāmena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3575_2: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3576_0: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsakhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tāṃ tathāgatān
S06sspp2_4u:3576_1: arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ drakṣyati. evaṃ khalu tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā
S06sspp2_4u:3576_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca tāṃ buddhān anusmṛtibhāvayitavyā dharmatayā.
S06sspp2_4u:3577: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saṃdraṣṭukāmena,
S06sspp2_4u:3578_0: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3578_1: paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3580: katame dve saṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā?
S06sspp2_4u:3582_0: yad adhyātmaśūnyatāyaṃ jñānaṃ yad bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3582_1: jñānaṃ yad śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad mahāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3582_2: jñānaṃ yad saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3582_3: jñānaṃ yad anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3582_4: jñānaṃ yad sarvadharmaśūnyatayāṃ jñānaṃ yad svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3582_5: jñānaṃ yad abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānam.
S06sspp2_4u:3614: yasyā notpādo na nirodho na sthānaṃ na sthito nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhir yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3620: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3621: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:3622: ye 'pi te etarhi daśadig lokadhātuṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3623: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06sspp2_4u:3624: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atītānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3625: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgatānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3626: ye 'py etarhi pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3627: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3633_0: ye 'pi te etarhi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
S06sspp2_4u:3633_1: yāpayanti tair apīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya pratyekabodhiḥ prāptāḥ prāpsyate
S06sspp2_4u:3634: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyā sarvāṇi trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3636: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3637: na hi prajñāpāramitā āramitā na pāramitā na hi prajñāpāramitā apāro na pāraḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3638: na sthalaṃ na nimnaṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na laukikī na lokottarā na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā na kuśalā nākuśalā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06sspp2_4u:3639: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmānāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3640: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā srotaāpattidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3641: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3642: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā anāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3643: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā arhaddharmāṇāṃ dātrī na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3644: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:3646: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3647_0: atra bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni
S06sspp2_4u:3647_1: prajānanti na sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate nātmanam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:3647_2: na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:3647_3: na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:3647_4: na kārakam upalabhate na vedakam upalabhate na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:3759: na hi prajñāpāramitopalambhayogena pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3760: tathā hi tasyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yenopalabhet yad vopapalabhet yatra vopalabhet.
S06sspp2_4u:3764: yathā hi tad dīrgharātrau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sa bodhim api nopalabhhate prāg eva buddhaṃ prāg eva buddhadharmān.
S06sspp2_4u:3765: śakra āha: punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na tadanyāsu pāramitāsu.
S06sspp2_4u:3767: sarvāsu kauśika ṣaḍpāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati tac cānupalambhayogena. sa dānam api nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3768: śīlam api nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3769: kṣāntim api nopalabhate kṣamīnam api nopalabhate vyāpādam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3770: vīryam api nopalabhate vīryavantam api nopalabhate kauśīdyam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3771: dhyānam api nopalabhate dhyāyinam api nopalabhate vikṣepam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3772: prajñām api nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate dauṣprajñam api nopalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:3773: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3774: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3775: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntyā saṃpādāya kṣāntipāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3776: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryam ālambhamānasya vīryapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3777: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3778: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmān viviktataḥ prajñāpāramitāparipūraye sarvadharmānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:3886: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nānāpatrāṇāṃ nānāpuṣpāṇāṃ nānāphalānāṃ nānāsaṃkhyānāṃ nānārohapariṇāhānāṃ teṣāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:3887: anyatra cchāyā cchāyety evaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti. evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_122)
S06sspp2_4u:3888: pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītānāṃ sarvajñajñānapariṇāmitānāṃ ca viśeṣo nānākraṇaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:3891_1: bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aparyavasānaguṇasamanvāgatayā tayā hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro
S06sspp2_4u:3891_2: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayet tāś ca
S06sspp2_4u:3891_3: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3891_4: cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair uttare ca yathopadiṣṭāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3891_5: prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād yo 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3891_6: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt kataras tayor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
S06sspp2_4u:3893: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra paripakṣyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3894: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:3895_0: kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:3895_1: pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3896: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06sspp2_4u:3897_0: tat sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ gṛhītvā satkuyād gurukruyāt mānayet pūjayet
S06sspp2_4u:3897_1: puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
S06sspp2_4u:3899: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavatā bhāṣitasvārtham ājānāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3900_0: yo yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:3900_1: pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3901: yo 'pi parasmai sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ dadyād ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3903_0: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vajropamaṃ samādhiḥ samāpadyaḥ vajropamam ātmabhāvaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3903_1: bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayya sattvakāye tathāgatadhātuvainayikānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3904: ye hi kecid bhagavan tathagatasyāntasaḥ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātuṃ pūjayiṣyanti vividhābhiḥ pūjābhiḥ sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam (ŚsP_II-4_123)
S06sspp2_4u:3908_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3908_1: kṛtvā satkuryād gurukruyād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3908_2: cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3908_3: parasmai likhitvā dadyād dharmaprītyā ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:3910_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭā
S06sspp2_4u:3910_1: parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīt deśayet saṃprakāśayet vicaret vibhajet uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa
S06sspp2_4u:3910_2: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāñ cāntikād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3911: śāstaiva saṃpratikāṅkṣitavyānyatarānyatarīyā gurusthānīyā vijñāḥ sabrahmacārī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3912: eṣa evātra kauśika śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstānyā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitaiva śāstā śāstaiḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3913: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3914_0: ye 'pi te vijñāḥ sabrahmacāriṇas te 'pi nānye anyatrāvaivartikabodhisattvebhyo yatra
S06sspp2_4u:3914_2: 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca. atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakayānikā api śikṣitvā
S06sspp2_4u:3918: pratyekabuddhayānikā api śikṣitvā pratyekabodhin abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃvuddhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3919: bodhisattvā api mahāsattvāḥ śikṣitvā bodhisattvaniyamam avakrāntā avakrāmanti avakrāmiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3920: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhānte abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:3921_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tathāgatān arhataḥ sayakṣaṃbuddhānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3921_1: mukhaṃ satkartukāmair gurukartukāmair mānayitukāmaiḥ pūjayitukāmaiḥ puṣpair mālyair
S06sspp2_4u:3921_2: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair
S06sspp2_4u:3921_3: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair (ŚsP_II-4_124)
S06sspp2_4u:3922: mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair imaṃ cārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaitad abhūt,
S06sspp2_4u:3923_0: katamad ahaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ so 'haṃ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:3923_1: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyām
S06sspp2_4u:3923_2: ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ cādhikaṃ vā na samanupaśyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3925_0: ya nv eva mayā dharmābhisaṃbuddhaḥ śāntaḥ praṇītas tam eva dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
S06sspp2_4u:3925_1: mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ katamaś cāsau kauśika dharmā yad uta saiva
S06sspp2_4u:3925_2: prajñāpāramitā aham eva tāvat kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaromi gurukaromi mānayāmi
S06sspp2_4u:3925_3: pūjayāmi satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya viharāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3926_0: kim aṅga punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmeneyaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3926_1: prajñāpāramitā na satkartavyā na gurukartavyā na mānayitavyā na pūjayitavyā puṣpair
S06sspp2_4u:3926_2: mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3927_0: śrāvakayānikair vā kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā pratyekabudhayānikair
S06sspp2_4u:3927_1: api kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3927_2: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:3927_3: dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3928_0: prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniryātāś ca tathāgatā
S06sspp2_4u:3928_1: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tathāgataniryātāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tasmāt tarhi kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:3928_2: bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā śrāvakayānikaiś ca pratyekabuddhayanikaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3928_3: ca kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3928_4: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:3928_5: dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś
S06sspp2_4u:3928_6: cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca śrāvakayānikāś
S06sspp2_4u:3928_7: cārhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca pratyekabuddhayānīkāś ca pratyekabodhiṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3932: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayeta:
S06sspp2_4u:3933: sacet kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:3934: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānāṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:3935: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:3937: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3938: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti ca avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3939: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3940: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3941: anagāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3942: arhattvaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3943: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3944: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti cāvakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3946: katame ca te kauśika sāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3947: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni.
S06sspp2_4u:3966: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3967_0: ime te kauśika anāsravā dharmā ye prajñāpāramitayā nirdiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3967_1: kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāś cābhisaṃbudhyante cābhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3968: evaṃ kauśikaikaṃ sattvaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā (ŚsP_II-4_126)
S06sspp2_4u:3970: na tv eva jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3971_0: daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ sattvā aparimuktā evaṃ narakatiryagyoner
S06sspp2_4u:3971_1: yamalokān srotaāpattiphale kauśika sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ parimukto narakatiryagyoner yamalokān,
S06sspp2_4u:3972: kaḥ punar vādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06sspp2_4u:3973: yaś ca punaḥ kauśika sarvajāmbūdvīpakān sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06sspp2_4u:3974: yaś caikaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3975_0: yo vā kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvajāmbūdvīpakān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed
S06sspp2_4u:3975_1: yaś ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekam api sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:3975_2: pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3977: ya ekasattvam apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3978_0: bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā
S06sspp2_4u:3978_1: bodhisattvaniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tad anena kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:3978_2: paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam. bodhisattvo 'pi pūjayitavyo mānayitavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3978_3: puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
S06sspp2_4u:3979: sa devakena lokena samārakena saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3980: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:3981: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:3984: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3986: paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3987: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitva samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3994: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3996: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:4020_0: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry aryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:4020_3: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:4020_4: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:4021: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:4022: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:4023: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4047: bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante. abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4051: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4117: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā (ŚsP_II-4_129)
S06sspp2_4u:4118: vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:4119: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:4122: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:4124: paṭhanāya vā Iekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:4125: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caśikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrānto avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:4130: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:4131: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:4132: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
S06sspp2_4u:4133: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,

S06sspp2_4u:6512: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:6515: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyaḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt,
S06sspp2_4u:6516: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:6517: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ (ŚsP_II-4_170)
S06sspp2_4u:6524: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:6525: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:6526: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:6527: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:6552_0: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:6553: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:6554: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:6555: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:6556: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:6585: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:6651_0: yāvantaḥ kauśikādhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid
S06sspp2_4u:6651_1: eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu
S06sspp2_4u:6651_2: catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?

S06sspp2_4u:6656: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:6937: na tv eva cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturḥv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya,
S06sspp2_4u:6938: na tv eva sāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya,

S06sspp2_4u:6996_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anena paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:6996_1: parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati prabhāvayiṣyati vivariṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:6999: na prajñāpāramitādvayeṇa draṣṭavyā na dvayena na nimittato nāyuhato nāniryūhataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:7001: na saṃkreśato na vyavadānato notpādato na nirodhataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:7002: na grahato nāgrahato nodgrahato notsargato na sthānato nāsthānato na bhūtato nābhūtataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:7003: na yogato nāyogato na śleṣmato nāśleṣmato na pratyayato nāpratyayato na dharmato nādharmataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:7004: na tathāgatato nātathāgatato na bhūtakoṭīto nābhūtakoṭītaḥ. ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:7005: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati vicariṣyati bhajiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:7008: na tv eva ya ātmanaikopagṛhīyāt paryavāpnuyād ādhārayed dhārayed vācayed yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt.
S06sspp2_4u:7010_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:7010_1: paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ ca parasmai vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:7011: utttanīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati. arthaṃ cāsya upadekṣyaty ayam eva sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:7012: śakra āha: evaṃ khalu bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:7016_0: evaṃ khlu kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā sārthā
S06sspp2_4u:7016_1: savyañjanā. evam upadiśan punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāmānena

S06sspp2_4u:7017_3: vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām

S06sspp2_4u:7034_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā adhastād diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:7034_1: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:7034_2: pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir

S06sspp2_4u:7035: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ (ŚsP_II-4_183)
S06sspp2_4u:7036: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:7037_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upariṣṭād diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:7037_1: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryān
S06sspp2_4u:7037_2: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:7037_3: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06sspp2_4u:7037_4: vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd
S06sspp2_4u:7037_5: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro
S06sspp2_4u:7037_6: vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:7038: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:7040: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:7046: yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parasmai vistareṇācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayet prajñāpayet prasthāpayed vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:7047: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:7049: dānaṃ datata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi idaṃ dānaṃ dadāmy asmai dānaṃ dadāmi tasyaivaṃ dānaṃ dadato dānam eva sthāsyati na dānapāramitā upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:7050: śīlaṃ rakṣata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmīdaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmi tasyaivaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlam eva sthāsyati na śīlapāramitā upalabhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:7051: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntibhāvayāmīmāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:7052: tasyaivaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayataḥ kṣāntir eva sthāsyati na kṣāntipāramitām upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:7053: vīryam ārabhamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhe asyārthāya vīryam ārabhe tasyaivaṃ vīryam ārabhamānasya vīryam eva sthāsyati na vīryapāramitā (ŚsP_II-4_184)
S06sspp2_4u:7055: dhyānāni samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadya imāni dhyānāni samāpadyetasyaivaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānāny eva sthāsyati na dhyānapāramitā upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:7056: prajñāṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmīmāṃ bhāvayāmi tasyaivaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñaiva sthāsyati na prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:7057_0: evaṃ khalu kauśikopalambhacaritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na dānapāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:7057_1: paripūryate na śīlapāramitā paripūryate na kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate na vīryapāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:7057_2: paripūryate na dhyānapāramitā paripūryate na prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.
S06sspp2_4u:7058: śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:7059: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:7060: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:7061: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:7062: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:7063: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:7065: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat na dāyakam upalabhate na dānaṃ pratigrāhakam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:7066: na śīlaṃ rakṣan na śīlaṃ na śīlasamādānam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:7067: na kṣāntiṃ bhāvayan na kṣāntiṃ rakṣanti bhāvanām upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:7068: na vīryam ārabhamāṇe na vīryāraṃbham upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:7071_0: evaṃ carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:7071_1: paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūryate
S06sspp2_4u:7072: evaṃ khalu kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā abudhyamānasya prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanām upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:7073: evam abudhyamānasya dhyānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:7074: evam abudhyamānasya vīryapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:7075: evam abudhyamānasya kṣāntipāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:7076: evam abudhyamānasya śīlapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:7078: dānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:7079: bhaviṣyanti kauśikānāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ye bodhisattvayānikebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:7080: tatra ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarā yaiḥ samyaksaṃbodhir ye saṃprasthitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:7081: te tāṃ prativarṇikāṃ śrutvā mārgāṃ praṇakṣanti teṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanā vistareṇopadiṣṭavyā.
S06sspp2_4u:7083: śakra āha: katamā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikā?
S06sspp2_4u:7085: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāma iti,
S06sspp2_4u:7087: śakra āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro yā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06sspp2_4u:7089: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:7092: yad uta rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7096: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7104: rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7108: vedanām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:7116: vedanām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ vedanām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7120: saṃjñām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,

S06sspp2_4u:8407: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8408_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ kulaputra prajñāīpāramitāṃ bhāvayan
S06sspp2_4u:8408_1: śrāvakabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi. iyaṃ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8409: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8410: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan bodhisattvanyāmam avakramiṣyāmy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilapsyase,
S06sspp2_4u:8411_0: sattvam anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabhya bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetrād
S06sspp2_4u:8411_1: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyasi tāṃ tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan
S06sspp2_4u:8411_2: mānayan pūjayan naivam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8412: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8413_0: yaḥ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06sspp2_4u:8413_1: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'prameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8413_2: evam upadiśantas teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8414_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8414_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām
S06sspp2_4u:8415: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat prathamacittotpādam upādāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:8416_0: yāvad anupādhiśeṣāṃ nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāṃ tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8416_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evam upadiśantas te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8418: śakra āha: katham upadiśanto bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06sspp2_4u:8420_0: iha kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8420_1: caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā
S06sspp2_4u:8420_2: ca rūpam anityam iti samanupaśyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8421: rūpaṃ svabhāvaśūnyaṃ yo rūpasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhūvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā na tatra rūpaṃ nitya iti vā anityam iti copalabhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:8422: rūpam eva na saṃvidyate nopalabhate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bbaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8423: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8424: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8425: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8426_0: vedanāsvabhāvena śūnyāyā vedanāyāḥ svabhāva so 'bhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8426_1: tatra na vedanā nityeti copalabhyate. vedanaiva tatra na samvidyate nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:8426_2: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8427_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8427_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8427_2: bhāvaya mā ca saṃjñām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8428_0: saṃjñāsvabhāvena śūnyāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8428_1: prajñāpāramitā na tatra saṃjñā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. saṃjñaiva tatra
S06sspp2_4u:8428_2: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vābhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8428_3: te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8430_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8430_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8430_2: bhāvaya mā ca saṃskārān anityā iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8431_0: saṃskārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvā yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8431_1: prajñāpāramitā tatra na saṃskārā nityā iti vā anityā iti vopalabhyate. saṃskārā eva
S06sspp2_4u:8431_2: tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8431_3: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8432_0: punar aparaṃ. kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ

S06sspp2_4u:8432_2: bhāvaya mā ca vijñānam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8433_0: vijñānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ yo vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ so bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

S06sspp2_4u:8433_2: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ

S06sspp2_4u:8434_2: bhāvaya mā ca cakṣur anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8435_0: cakṣuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaś cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8435_1: tatra na cakṣur nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. cakṣur eva tatra na saṃvidyate.

S06sspp2_4u:8526: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:8527: tatra na kāyasaṃsparśpratyayavedanā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanaiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:8528: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8529_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8529_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8529_2: bhāvaya mā ca manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8530: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā svabhāvena śūnyā yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:8531_0: tatra na manaḥsaṃsparśpratyayavedanā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanaiva
S06sspp2_4u:8531_1: tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8531_2: kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8533_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8533_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8533_2: bhāvaya mā ca pṛthivīdhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8534: pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ pṛthivīdhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:8535_0: tatra na pṛthivīdhātuḥ nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. pṛthivīdhātur eva tatra
S06sspp2_4u:8535_1: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8535_2: te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8536: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām (ŚsP_II-4_225)
S06sspp2_4u:8537: upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā cābdhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8538: abdhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yo 'bdhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhavaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:8539_0: tatra nābdhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. abdhātur eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8539_1: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:8539_2: vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8540_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8540_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8540_2: bhāvaya mā ca tejodhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8541: tejodhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yas tejodhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:8542_0: tatra na tejodhātuḥ nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. tejodhātur eva tatra na
S06sspp2_4u:8542_1: saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te
S06sspp2_4u:8542_2: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

S06sspp2_4u:8546_2: bhāvaya mā cākāśadhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8547: ākāśadhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo ya ākāśadhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,

S06sspp2_4u:8557_0: saṃskārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhavā yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā

S06sspp2_4u:8557_2: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ

S06sspp2_4u:8579_2: bhāvaya mā ca jātim anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8581_0: svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na jātir
S06sspp2_4u:8581_1: nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. jātir eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo
S06sspp2_4u:8581_2: vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā

S06sspp2_4u:8583_3: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

S06sspp2_4u:8708_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8708_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8708_2: bhāvaya mā ca sarvākārajñatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8709_0: sarvākārajñatā svabhāvena śunyā yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8709_1: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sarvākārajñatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8709_2: sarvākārajñatā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8709_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8710: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayanikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8711: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca kaṃ cid dharmaṃ samatikramiṣyasi sā kvacid dharme pratiṣṭhāsyati. tat kasya (ŚsP_II-4_244)
S06sspp2_4u:8712: hetoh? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saddharmo na saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ samatikramitavyo yatra vā pratiṣṭhātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8713_0: tathā hi kauśika sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvo na śūnyā yaś ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so
S06sspp2_4u:8713_1: 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na kaścid dharma āyūhitavyo
S06sspp2_4u:8713_2: vā niryūhitavyo vā utpādayitavyo vā nirodhayitavyo vā,
S06sspp2_4u:8714_0: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
S06sspp2_4u:8714_1: upadekṣyanti. tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā
S06sspp2_4u:8714_2: artham upadeṣṭavyo evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8715: na tv eva te paurvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:8717: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kascid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:8718: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8721: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:8722: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:8723_0: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi
S06sspp2_4u:8723_1: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
S06sspp2_4u:8723_2: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8724: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:8725: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvipakāḥ sattvā yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:8726: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8729: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:8730: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:8731_0: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ vadet. ehi tvaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8731_1: kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
S06sspp2_4u:8733: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:8734_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.

S06sspp2_4u:8734_2: vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?

S06sspp2_4u:9226: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā adhyātmaśūnyatāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9245: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā smṛtyupasthāneṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9269_0: te khalu punar bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmasaṃgrahaś cāmiṣasaṃgraheṇaṃ cānuś cānugṛhūnto
S06sspp2_4u:9269_1: bahutaraṃ te kulaputra kuladuhitaraś ca puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti. na tv eva te paurvakāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:9269_2: kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:9319: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
S06sspp2_4u:9320: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyā utsāhaṃ dadāsi bodhisattvānām ugṛhīṣve anupārayasi,
S06sspp2_4u:9321: evam eṣa tvayā kauśika karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sattvānām anugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām (ŚsP_II-4_269)
S06sspp2_4u:9322: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv utsāhaṃ dadhātu dharmām iṣānugraheṇa ca bodhisattvān anugṛhātv anuparipārayatu. tat kasya hetoh?
S06sspp2_4u:9323_0: ataḥ prasabohi kauśika bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghāḥ yad uta bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:9323_1: yadi ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittan notpādayan na
S06sspp2_4u:9323_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣeta ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:9365: nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na pratyekabuddhā prajñāparan na śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9366: yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu danapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:9409: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaiḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu naraka ucchidyante tiryagyoni ucchidyante yamaloka ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_4u:9410: āsurāś ca kāyā parihīyante divyāṃs ca kāyā abhivartante,
S06sspp2_4u:9461: anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:9490: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
